svtool.gui.views
Class QueryView

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  svtool.gui.views.DBView
                      svtool.gui.views.QueryView
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.event.ActionListener, Configurable, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.event.KeyListener, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.event.TableModelListener
public class QueryView
extends DBView
implements javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, javax.swing.event.TableModelListener, Configurable

This window holds all the queries and allows querying of the database. The key ideas are: Cache queries. Delete queries from cache. Add queries to cache only if not duplicate. Show query results in table.

See Also:
Serialized Form

 class QueryView.QueryTableModel
          The model for the table that takes the result and converts into table data that can be displayed into the table.

viewClosing

public void viewClosing()
Called when the database is being closed. This function should be implemented so that when the database is called, the view may change to reflect this or to clear out all data that is currently displaying.

Specified by:
viewClosing in class DBView
